properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CATEGORY, PROD_IMG, PRICE, BID_PRICE, USER_ID, REGISTER_DATE, END_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (SELLER_NO = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
